医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
资金削减了危害数十年来减少儿童死亡和死产的进步根据联合国儿童死亡率估计机构间跨机构估算机构（UNIGME）今天发布的两份新报告，在2023年五岁之前死亡的儿童人数在2023年下降至480万，而死产的人数仍保持谦虚约为190万。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/funding-cuts-endanger-decades-of-progress-progress-in-reducing-child-child-child-deaths-and-stillbirths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/funding-cuts-endanger-decades-decades-of-progress-in-reducing-child-child-child-dephs-deaths-and-stillbirths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d94a580b-4d2222222222-4f14-89a3-7b90edc87792 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 07:49:15 -0400 Funding cuts endanger decades of progress in reducing child deaths and stillbirths
埃里格（Elrig）宣布罗里·约翰逊（Rory Johnson）教授和沙利尼·安德森（Shalini Andersson）博士在治疗性寡核苷酸2025上担任主题演讲者埃里格（Elrig）是一家非营利性，由志愿者领导的药物发现社区组织，今天宣布了5月14日至15日在瑞典哥德堡的阿斯利康（Astrazeneca）研发地点举行的治疗性寡核苷酸的主题演讲者。都柏林大学学院副教授罗里·约翰逊（Rory Johnson）和阿斯利康副总裁核酸疗法副总裁Shalini Andersson博士将主持今年的活动，重点是“吸毒不足”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/elrig-announces-prof-rory-rory-johnson-and-dr-shalini-andersson-as-keynote-speakers-speakers-therapeers-therapeast-therapeater-therapheutic-therapheutic-therapherutic-oligoncotidides-2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/elrig-announces-prof-rory-johnson-and-dr-shalini-andersson-askeynote-speakers-speakers-therapeers-attherapeer-attherpherapheutic-therapherapeutic-therapheutic-therapheutic-therapheutic-oligonuctidides-20255.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41a874444444-9965-4d57-9673-21E48ED2273 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 07:44:00 -0400 ELRIG announces Prof Rory Johnson and Dr Shalini Andersson as keynote speakers at Therapeutic Oligonucleotides 2025
SEHTA Healthcare Business Awards认可BedFont®ScientificImimit for Innovation Bedfont®ScientificLimited很高兴被选为2025年东南健康技术联盟（SEHTA）奖项的创新类别的决赛入围者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/SEHTA-Healthcare-Business-Awards-recognizes-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-for-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/SEHTA-Healthcare-Business-Awards-recognizes-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-for-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c9d67eb-1bd6-4994-4994-af9a-16caca4789d7 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 07:20:00 -0400 SEHTA Healthcare Business Awards recognizes Bedfont® Scientific Limited for innovation
许多残疾人可能会失去医疗补助，如果他们工作太多扎克·梅切姆（Zach Mecham）听说政客要求医疗补助接收者工作或失去福利。他还遇到了一系列医疗补助规则，这些规则有效地阻止了许多残疾人从事全职工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/many-people-with-with-disabilities-risk-losing-their-their-medicaid-if-if--took-work-took-too-too-too-much.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/many-people-with-disabilities-risk-losing-their-their-medicaid-if-if--took-work-took-too-much.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39c8f6ff-5BB6-46BF-8F7E-3AC763AB1D2C Tue, 25 Mar 2025 07:06:27 -0400 Many people with disabilities risk losing their Medicaid if they work too much
美国专利办公室授予GLP-1和直接口服抗凝剂（DOAC）疗法的心脏代谢能力的封闭循环医学关键专利AI-Spable Precision药物领导者的封闭Loop Medicine Ltd.今天宣布扩大其美国专利组合。加强其心脏代谢治疗组合，该公司现在拥​​有专利，涵盖了肥胖和糖尿病的GLP-1疗法的进步，以及直接的口服抗凝剂（DOAC）（DOACS）用于心血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/us-patent-office-office-grants-clants-claste-close-close-close-medicine-key-patents-for-cardiometimomet-cardiometabolic-capabolic-capabolic-chlp-1-in-glp-1-1----------------- eral-oral-oral-coagagulants-coagulants-coagulants-coagulants-coagulants-eptooacce-- thedoacce- asspeass.aspx.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/US-Patent-Office-grants-Closed-Loop-Medicine-key-patents-for-cardiometabolic-capabilities-in-GLP-1-and-Direct-Oral-Anti-Coagulants-(DOAC)-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27da9bf7-220f-434c-b750-dd1adc213dad Tue, 25 Mar 2025 06:29:00 -0400 US Patent Office grants Closed Loop Medicine key patents for cardiometabolic capabilities in GLP-1 and Direct Oral Anti-Coagulants (DOAC) therapies
优化纳洛酮试剂盒分布以防止阿片类药物死亡多伦多大学工程研究人员的一项新研究指出，通过优化纳洛酮试剂盒的分布来防止阿片类药物中毒死亡的实用策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/optimizing-naloxone-kit-distribution-to-prevent-opioid-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/optimizing-naloxone-kit-distribution-to-prevent-opioid-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c2ec62b-b1ed-4699-962a-962a-9fdb3c9382ae Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:26:00 -0400 Optimizing naloxone kit distribution to prevent opioid deaths
了解铁依赖性铁毒在免疫抑制中的作用铁依赖性铁凋亡是一种非凋亡细胞死亡机制，它因其在免疫抑制中的作用而引起人们的注意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/understanding-the-the--role-of-rir-iron-depertent-ferroptosis-in-mmmune-suppression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/understanding-the-the-the-the--role-of-rir-dipper--ferroptosis-in-roptosis-in-mmmmune-suppression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97CCDB50-F30C-4E30-8E9D-832CA8E2DC3E Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:22:00 -0400 Understanding the role of iron-dependent ferroptosis in immune suppression
